meta.title: Kennewick School District
meta.script: if (!('console' in window)) window.console = { log: function() { ; } }

div.p: UPDATE APRIL 6: By executive order, all schools are closed for the remainder of the school year. However, Continuous Distance Learning will continue. Por orden ejecutiva, todas las escuelas están cerradas por el resto del año escolar. Sin embargo, el aprendizaje continuo a distancia continuará.

div.address:
Kennewick School District
1000 W. Fourth Avenue
Kennewick, WA 99336
Driving Directions

div.div: Register, immunizations, boundary maps, bus routes and more.
Connect to colleges, career resources, email and more.
Get involved by volunteering, rent school facilities, public records requests, and more.
View the most recent catalog and register for classes.

div.p: Kennewick School District is now accepting kindergarten registrations for the 2020-21 school year.
We’re excited to open up registration for our free ECEAP preschool for 2020-21.
Three of our schools are being honored by the state for their success in closing gaps and helping students make gains!

div.h4: Student Grading and Continuous Distance Learning
div.p: On April 21, 2020, the state Office of Superintendent of Public Instruction (OSPI) provided new rules on student grading, in light of the COVID-19 school closure.
KSD is providing free breakfast, lunch and weekend meals to our students Monday through Friday at all elementary schools, two middle schools and several bus drop-off locations.
Access learning resources and links that support the learning activities provided by your child's teacher.
Learn more about resources available in our community to help our families during the school closure.
We want to share information about novel coronavirus, or COVID-19, to help you stay informed and healthy.
Learn more about some childcare options in our area during the school closure.
Check out the 2020-21 school calendar at www.ksd.org/calendar

body.script: $('body').on('click', 'a[data-platform-login=true]', function() { var w = window.open('about:blank'); $.get('.siteID', function(v) { w.location.href = '/admin/platform/?site=' + v.id + '&session=' + v.session_id; }); return false; });
